alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 9:45AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Ashtabula, southwestern Erie and northwestern Crawford Counties through 1030 AM EDT... At 945 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Andover, or 13 miles southeast of Ashtabula, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Conneaut, Girard, Albion, Pymatuning North, Lake City, Pierpont, Cherry Valley, Conneautville, Cranesville, Springboro, Platea, Kelloggsville and Avonia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
